Articles.Content:
Always wanted to do a really good KSP stargate, and after mucking around with about 3 different methods for roughly 2 hours, I created this beauty

You wouldn't believe how difficult it is to turn straight lines into something roughly circular...

(no it doesn't work, only for looks, which it does well)

Here's the download https://www.dropbox.com/s/3ojxcf0dtqptnpd/Stargate%20mk3.craft

A few things:

1) It comes with a launcher that is more than capable of putting it into orbit

2) The probe you can see is the base capsule

3) A little wobbly when it loads, but nothing to worry about

Enjoy!

Edited April 28, 2013 by BrightBritches
Added Download Link :)

I am very much interested in this! Combine this with an updated version of that wormhole travel mod and you could, in fact, create your own stargate network. And that would just be all kinds of awesome! You could also use the Hyperjump System to emulate it, though I've heard that mod is having a few issues.

...I think that if you give us the download, I'll actually set this down in the antarctic region of Kerbin and begin a mission to set one down at each of my colony sites, just for fun.

I am very much interested in this!

Yay interest!

I'll look into those mods tomorrow, and if I can get them to work I'll make an updated working version
This thread has [stock] in the title. Is it?

This thread has [stock] in the title. Is it?

Yes it is completely stock. Will most likely be putting up the .craft file tomorrow evening, but if it ever becomes not stock I'll either make a new thread for that version or remove the [stock] from the title. In the latter case, I would make it clear which download was stock and which was modded
Looks awesome The white things are lights?

Looks awesome The white things are lights?

Nooooo, they're chevrons obviously

(Yes, they are lol)
Nicely done! Now we just need a Jack O'Kerman and Daniel Kerman mod to make it complete.

Kerbal Crew Manifest should do what you're looking for. It allows you to do all kinds of fun things with your kerbals!

I may use it to start a colony populated solely by kerbals named after people I know... So that I can tell them when, where, and how they died.

"I'm sorry to inform you, but you were eaten by the Kraken. May you rest in his belly comfortably."

Nooooo, they're chevrons obviously

(Yes, they are lol)

Chevron one encoded!

Looks awesome, well done
Yay! Looks nice. Totally useless, but it looks nice. That's like even better than if it did something

That's like even better than if it did something

Agreed - to make something that looks awesome but have no function is the height of Kerbalness.

Keen to see the download.
Quick question: Did you use the symmetry option while creating this? If you didn't, I have a neat idea for action group use...

Nicely done! Now we just need a Jack O'Kerman and Daniel Kerman mod to make it complete.

Squad, make this happen!

Edit: noticed the mod mentioned right after I hit submit. Oh well.

Quick question: Did you use the symmetry option while creating this? If you didn't, I have a neat idea for action group use...

Yeah I did, I realized after what could have been done with action groups

Actually the way the symmetry worked putting the lights on, the symmetrical copy of each set of lights is actually on the opposite side of the gate but on the back. So you could still use the action groups to make the gate "dial" if you want

Yeah I did, I realized after what could have been done with action groups

Actually the way the symmetry worked putting the lights on, the symmetrical copy of each set of lights is actually on the opposite side of the gate but on the back. So you could still use the action groups to make the gate "dial" if you want

LOL all that's missing now is the big whoosh of unstable vortex to finish off this replica. Btw anyone fancy making a Kerbal version of the Deadalus battlecruiser?

Nicely done! Now we just need a Jack O'Kerman and Daniel Kerman mod to make it complete.

And lets not forget a Jaffa that we all love to see (Teal'c)

LOL all that's missing now is the big whoosh of unstable vortex to finish off this replica. Btw anyone fancy making a Kerbal version of the Deadalus battlecruiser?

I actually did one a while ago, not sure if I still have the save file with it though :/
Does it have generators/batteries inside it so the lights don't run out of power?
Awesome. Simply awesome. Let's all hope this wormhole mod will work...OMG! Somebody have to find a way to make a Puddle Jumper!
I have this sudden urge to try to make an F-302...

I want to see a Daedalus

By the way, 8 chevrons, nice Pegasus style spacegate.

Actually I want to see an Aurora class ship too. Sadly I suck so badly at making things its way out of my ability
Yes it has its own power, and I figured that since 7 chevrons is enough for travel inside a galaxy, its plenty for a single solar system

Well since i couldnt find any mod that either A) worked like i want it too or didnt have a threat of tearing your ship apart, i'm now in the process of making my own mod

will continue to post updates on how its progress is going
Yes, Make stargates work!!
